name: vushaper
tag_list: self-assembling-video-engine, video, mobile, sav, ror, ios, mobile-video, iphone, cdn
overview:
We invented self-assembling video. With video technology patents as old as 1997 and a 2007 Emmy for the best video on demand experience, Vushaper delivers self-assembling unicast with the power of broadcast. Every second is relevant. It’s unicast with the big bang of broadcast.

Curated and authored experiences are valued for their entertainment power. In today’s world these are exemplified by feature films and video games. Like video-on-demand, video games are user-input dependent, but this responsiveness is bought at a high price: the viewer’s experience is limited to the rigid world of the authored app, and the publisher needs to deep-dive into time-consuming authoring.

Vushaper’s architecture is the only method that combines the power and momentum of conventional television with the relevance and immediacy of video-on-demand.
